komarshal bankuwe kalamanakara adhyaksha saha pradhana widhayaka niladhari rawi dayas, pradhana meheyum niladhari jegan dureyirathnam mahathwaru da mehi wethi.aabadhitha ranawiruwan wenuwen kurunagala, pangolle idikara thibena ‘abimansala 3’ rakawarana madhyasthanayata komarshal bankuwe aayathanika samaja wagakim bharaya wisin nawa niwasayak ha eyata awashya gruhabhanda parithyaga kara atha.mema madhyasthanaye niwasa atak pawathina athara, mehi sama niwasakma nidana kamara dekak, rupawahini narambaum sthanayak sahitha salayak, aabadhitha ranawiruwanta bhawitha kala haki aakarayata sakas kala nana kamara yana pahasukamwalin samanwitha we.
